definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Transmits by high quality three chains.
Remove chain drive wheel from crankshaft.
sentences.chinese: 從曲軸上拆下鏈條驅動輪。

sentences.english: Therefore, the enterprise can adopt the proposal of double-chain (internal and external) credit risk control.
sentences.chinese: 因此，企業可採取內外雙鏈條信用控制方案。

sentences.english: It is interlocked with the crankshaft via the chain drive .
sentences.chinese: 它通過鏈條驅動機構與曲軸互鎖在一起。

sentences.english: Firstly, corporate foundations are the fund providers in the value chain.
sentences.chinese: 首先，企業基金會是價值鏈條中的資金提供者。

sentences.english: The chain surrounded on the back of heel band provides perfect and tight attachment of shoe last to the band.
sentences.chinese: 後跟束緊器鏈條環抱皮套設計，充分發揮束緊力功能。

sentences.english: The phase is adjusted manually and harmonically with rapid and accurate adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 鏈條送紙，相位手動諧波調節，調整快速而準確。

sentences.english: The oil pump is driven by a chain drive on the crankshaft.
sentences.chinese: 機油泵由曲軸上的鏈條驅動裝置來驅動。

sentences.english: I walked to the storeroom, hung the weight on the toilet chain .
sentences.chinese: 我走進堆房，把秤砣掛在水箱鏈條上。

sentences.english: Fit timing chain cover on oil pump.
sentences.chinese: 安裝機油泵的正時鏈條罩。

sentences.english: Introduce the character of high-temperature greases and the successful application to cold bed chain.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了高溫脂的特性，及在冷牀鏈條中的成功應用。

sentences.english: As he fell, he grasped at a hanging chain but missed it.
sentences.chinese: 跌倒時他向一條懸掛的鏈條抓去，但沒有抓到。

sentences.english: Chain is one of the critical parts composing the mono- chain cold- drawing pipe mill.
sentences.chinese: 鏈條是單鏈冷拔管機的關鍵部件。

sentences.english: Chain, as one of the basic mechanical parts, now is wildly used in many fields of national economy.
sentences.chinese: 鏈條是各種機械上使用十分廣泛的基礎件之一。

sentences.english: We organize the dissertation in order according to the sequence of logic ratiocination.
sentences.chinese: 文章組織的順序與邏輯推理的鏈條是一致的。

sentences.english: What YOU carry is a ten foot length of pass-link chain.
sentences.chinese: 而你的裝備是一條十尺長的鏈條。

definition: industry chain (concept proposed by US scholar Michael Porter in 1985)
